# `is-node`

Detects if the current process is a node application or not.

## Usage

```javascript
const isNode = require("is-node");

if (isNode) {
  console.log("Hey, I'm a node process!");
}
```

```typescript
import isNode from "is-node";

if (isNode) {
  console.log("Hey, I'm a node process!");
}
```
